column1:
1. Which one of these is a fruit?
a. Apple -> YOUR ANSWER
b. Onion
c. Tomato
d. Cabbage

2. Which one of these is red?
a. Apple -> YOUR ANSWER
b. Onion
c. Tomato
d. Cabbage

3. Which one of these is not a fruit?
a. Garlic
b. Grape
c. Cranberry
d. Kiwi -> YOUR ANSWER

4. Which one of these is yellow?
a. Orange
b. Banana -> YOUR ANSWER
c. Mango
d. Cabbage

5. Which one of these is a vegetable?
a. Carrot
b. Banana
c. Potato -> YOUR ANSWER
d. Onion
